Docs.summary: Represents a collection of values that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Values *oneOrMorePoints* One or more values, with each pair delimited by a single comma and/or one or more spaces. _[delimiter__]\*_ For example, `"0,0 100,100 200,100"` and `"0,0,100,100,200,100"` are both valid. *oneOrMorePointObjectElements* One or more values, declared using object element syntax.
